name: Tip Tap Rio
description:
Host the best sporting event Rio has ever seen!

Tap, tap, tap to encourage fans into your stadium.

Earn money by investing in sponsorships, mascots and thirst-quenching drinks. Boost your profits with lucrative TV deals and attract the interest of mega-investors.

Spend your millions on building bigger arenas to attract thousands of sports loving fans!

Download now and become the next Tip Tap Rio tycoon!
